name: Conte Sans (iOS10-12)
author: Evelyn (ev_ynw)
description:
Normal size. Install 'Conte Sans_85% (iOS10-12)' for smaller character size.

Optimised for iOS12. Also downward compatible with iOS10&11.

Installed to: /Library/Themes/[fontname].theme/

Apply with Anemone. Package name = Fonts.

Need help? Link to tutorials in my pinned tweet
